reviews.review_msg: Scott is a TA who understands the importance of being a good TA.  Always accessible outside of class to answer any questions or concerns. If you email and ask him for additional feedback on something, he is gonna make sure to go above and beyond to provide that for you. Attendance matters, but he doesnt force anyone to participate which is good.

Scott was my TA for Engl 114W. He is a really good TA. He is incredibly knowledgeable about academic writing. He is a tough grader sometimes, but also provides some of the best feedback ever. His feedback makes it easier for you to see your weakness early on and improve it.
